meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>sell</kanji> something <kanji>cheap</kanji>, you're selling it at a <vocabulary>discount</vocabulary>. Alternatively you can remember this word as <vocabulary>sell cheaply</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>bargain sale</vocabulary>. These are good deals!
readingMnemonic: The hiragana on the end hints that the readings are the kun'yomi readings. Use your memory of 安い and 売る to help you to remember how to read this.
